description: This centrally located Greenpoint apartment is on a quiet block with a garden view. The space is well organized for a single or couple, very comfortable with windows overlooking both the garden and Leonard Street. The neighborhood is central Greenpoint, one block from the G train and mainstays such as McCarren Park, Torst, Five Leaves, Nights and Weekends, Matchless, and countless cafes and shops. The Nassau G is steps away and it's about a 10 min walk to the Bedford L and central Williamsburg.
name: Private, Ideally Located Greenpoint Apartment
review: The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
